[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Winst (verlies) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 1,173,000 reported in the network role http://crescent.com/xbrl/2020/roles/OverzichtVanDeFinancielePositie should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of -2,617,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://crescent.com/xbrl/2020/roles/MutatieoverzichtVanHetEigenVermogen. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of OtherReserves : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300LD2NEVEYBEBI54/2020-12-31/ESEF/BE/0/crescent-2020-12-31.zip/crescent-2020-12-31/reports/crescent-2020-12-31.xhtml 3890
